title: New Epic skin: God Staff Jax

replies.body: Yall remember whenb  he said, IMAGINE IF I HAD A REAL WEAPON...... well what now folks ?
He's using a standing lanter... How is that a real weapon?

I mean... many of his skins have 'real weapons'. Axes, clubs, halberds (or whatever you want to call temple jax's weapon), etc.
Just sayin'...
That's still a lantern.

This name is imo terrible.

Because all I see is "Good Stuff Jax".

I mean, it's a good name, but I'd think a skin meant to be legitimately epic wouldn't have a name this easy to joke about. 

Maybe it's just me.
I like it even more now that I see Good Stuff Jax haha
but brolaf????
u r not the only one!

So is that what the "god" skin set is going to be.  Lee sin got his eyes.  Jax got a "real weapon"

Can we get a god mech rumble were he actually gets tristana?

NOICE
{{champion:24}}
Asura's Wrath... WITH A STICK

It's really really sad that the multiple arms, which seems like a key part of this skin general idea as shown in the splash art, is only visible in game by recalling. I would've thought that it would trigger with some other animations but well, this is a disapointment
Well now we know why he's called the grandmaster at arms...
only an epic?
satisfied
Finally!!!!
Absolutely amazing skin, I love the concept and execution of the design! I'm hoping to see a God Hoof Alistar next! {{champion:12}}
imagine if you have a really weapon...nice

C O N T E N T, P L E A S E D 
, btw im confused, was the grasp of undying change canceled or was that just post poned for next patch
It was canceled, but riot said they may make an entirely new keystone somewhat like what the changes were going to be.
cancelled.
God Staff Jax is so cool!!!! I played with God Staff Jax and got 21/2/9{{champion:24}} {{item:3031}}{{sticker:sg-kiko}}

In game, the skin is not labeled as an Epic skin, it is labeled as a normal skin. Is this intentional?

-Confused Jax main

Is this a good time to mention that Jax does not use his real weapon... because he decided the arena was too easy? 

Skins of him with a real weapon shouldn't happen.
hi

*god lamp wax






I meant to say jax, but this worked out even better....
I want to see a god wukong skin.

no new voice lines? couldn't even take out the "imagine if i had a real weapon" taunt? only difference for this skin is the voice echo, ult animation, and the attack animation. so great for a "God" skin.
I guess you can say Jax is well armed.
I don't want to pay for a 1350 skin that doesn't have new V.O. work done :(

let's do this
{{champion:24}}
it's weird that after I got this skin and went to check it in my skin collection, it says this is not an epic skin.. I mean the number of epic skins I owned didn't change ?
I already have enough problems facing Jax as is, now theres going to be several Jaxes running around in every game thinking they're God....{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
The fact this is an epic skin makes me on board with "Good Stuff" Jax.
Really wish we got an icon though.
oh god
